ProfessionSubtitle: Creating immersive experiences through video games. Specialized in Unity and game ports to other platforms.

AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.DescriptionP1: My name is Alfonso LÃ³pez Viejo, and I have been in the programming and video game development industry for four years professionally. My journey began in 2016 when I decided to pursue a degree in Game Design and Development at UDIT. The beginnings were challenging, but with perseverance and dedication, I managed to complete my degree in 2020.
AboutMe.DescriptionP2: It was during this degree that I discovered my passion for programming and problem-solving. Since childhood, I have always been a curious, logical, and resourceful person, and this profession has allowed me to fully utilize these qualities.
AboutMe.DescriptionP3: My first professional opportunity was in the game porting sector. Thanks to two indie projects, I was able to start developing professionally and applying the knowledge acquired during my studies. From this beginning until now, my passion for programming and the video game industry has continued to grow, and I strive for professional development every day.
AboutMe.DescriptionP4: Currently, I have specialized in console ports and have worked on various mobile development projects. Every day, I continue learning new technologies and am eager to acquire as much knowledge as possible to further develop my professional skills in the industry.

metal-tales-overkill.name: Game Port: Metal Tales Overkill
metal-tales-overkill.shortDescription: Participated with other members in porting the game 'Metal Tales' to PS4 and Switch.
metal-tales-overkill.fullDescription:
Metal Tales Overkill is the ported version of the Metal Tales video game, a metal-themed roguelike with multiple levels, enemies, items, and environments. 
 The port was developed in Unity as it was an older project initially built using this engine. In this project, I learned the process of porting a PC project to PS4/Switch, which marked the beginning of my career in this field.

challenges.challenge1: Learning from scratch how to port games to PS4 and Switch.
challenges.challenge2: First project in the professional sector.
challenges.challenge3: Solving issues arising from working with an old project.

sonar-beat.name: Game Port: Sonar Beat
sonar-beat.shortDescription: Participated with other members in porting the game 'Sonar Beat' to PS4 and Switch, a rhythm game originally for PC and mobile.
sonar-beat.fullDescription:
This project is the ported version of the Sonar Beat video game, a rhythm game with different levels where the player must press notes appearing on the screen in sync with a constantly rotating sonar. It features multiple levels with increasing difficulty. 
 The port was developed in Unity since the original project was built using this engine. It was developed for both Europe and Asia. This project provided me with final experience to gain a strong understanding of porting to PS4 and Switch. However, I remain eager to continue working on more projects and learning more about the subject.

challenges.challenge1: Learning the ranking system for Switch and PS4.
challenges.challenge2: Learning how to create a multi-language project for Switch and PS4.
challenges.challenge3: Solving issues related to the porting process.
